attributes.action: I want the UK to donate 50 million pounds to poor countries for education.
attributes.additional_details: It is people who have lots of education that live on great lives so i want more people to have this success in life.
attributes.background: There are lots of countries that are poorer then the uk and can't afford education so I want you to donate 50 million pounds for poorer peoples countries for education.

rejection.details:
The UK Government already provides significantly more than £50 million in foreign aid to support education in lower income countries. In 2020 the Government allocated £545 million of foreign aid to education.

You can find out more about UK aid spending here: https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/statistics-on-international-development

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to increase foreign aid spending on education, if that's what you want to happen.
